subject: Check out my photos on Facebook
author: Mick Retort
full_text:
--b1_a71fbbb59a2a220d53cedfbf3d4a917b
Content-Type: text/plain; charset = "UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi evp-itc@yahoogroups.com,

I invited you to join Facebook a while back an=
d wanted to remind you that once you join, we'll be able to connect online,=
 share photos, organize groups and events, and more.

Thanks,
Mick

To sign=
 up for Facebook, follow the link below:
http://www.facebook.com/p.php?i=3D=
100000211513940&k=3DZ6E3Y5UZT26DVFDJPB63QTSQPVJG453&r


evp-itc@yahoogroups=
.com was invited to join Facebook by Mick Retort. If you do not wish to rec=
eive this type of email from Facebook in the future, please click on the li=
nk below to unsubscribe.
http://www.facebook.com/o.php?k=3De4ed4f&u=3D10000=
0223394233&mid=3D104df08G5af31dcaf9b9G0G8
Facebook's offices are located at=
 1601 S. California Ave., Palo Alto, CA 94304.


--b1_a71fbbb59a2a220d53cedfbf3d4a917b
